title: 5 reasons Sonic fans see ‘Sonic Frontiers’ as an undeniable win

title: Amazon plans to cut thousands of jobs, report says
description: The e-commerce giant, which reportedly will shed roughly 10,000 jobs as soon as this week, would become the latest big tech company to slash its workforce.

title: Jeff Bezos says he will give away most of his massive fortune
description: The Amazon founder, who has a net worth north of $124 billion, joins a growing list of billionaires who have made similar pledges.

title: A fake tweet sparked panic at Eli Lilly and may have cost Twitter millions
description: "For $8, they’re potentially losing out on millions of dollars in ad revenue," said Amy O’Connor, a former senior communications official at Eli Lilly who now works at a trade association.

title: America has an earthquake early-warning system now — on your phone
description: Your phone could now give you an up to 60 second warning when a big earthquake is about to hit
